name: LinkedIn
description: Add a LinkedIn Instance to connect your existing LinkedIn account to the Social Hub, allowing you to manage companies, comments, followers and likes across multiple Social Elements. You will need your LinkedIn account information to add an instance.

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval
configuration.description: Set time interval for polling application (in minutes)

configuration.name: Event Poller Resources Configuration
configuration.description: Event Poller Resources Configuration. The configuration is defined via JSON, an example of which is as follows - { "contacts": { "url": "/hubs/helpdesk/contacts", “idField”: “user.id”, “datesConfiguration”: { "updatedDateField": "user.updated_at", "updatedDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX", “createdDateField”: “user.created_at”, “createdDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX" }, "pageSize": 10000 } }

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number. Defaults to 1 if not provided

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size. Defaults to 100 if not provided. Maximum of 2000

resources.description: Get the number of followers of a company

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The company id

resources.description: Get historical follower statistics about a company.

parameters.name: time-granularity
parameters.description: Granularity of statistics. Supported values are: day and month.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The company Id.

parameters.name: start-timestamp
parameters.description: Starting timestamp (in milliseconds) of when the stats search should begin. Start time and end time should be less than 14 months apart.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

parameters.name: end-timestamp
parameters.description: Ending timestamp (in milliseconds) of when the stats search should end. Default value is current time if not set. Start time and end time should be less than 14 months apart.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 2000.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated list of language codes ordered from highest to lowest priority of preference you would prefer to have returned. For example, en_US, fr_FR, de_DE, ja_JP.
